system.description: Used mostly as heavy hitters in undead armies, these beasts are a menace and known for crushing through tough defenses.
system.appearance: Pale white, sometimes rotting, giant humanoids. These beasts are made from pieced together giant and ogre bits. They usually have three arms instead of two making their strength even more terrifying.

overview.base: You gain Offensive Martial Arts and Defensive Martial Arts.

Your hands count as weapons for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with them and their damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].

overview.base:
Your hands count as shields for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may block with them and their BV is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands blocking.
You count as being undead for the purposes of abilities, damage, and other effects. You also gain Ethereal Senses,Healing Sensitivity,Slow Mana Drain,Undead Mind,and Undying Durability.
You can see and hear spirits and Ethereal creatures.

Healing can be used to damage you. If the creature providing you healing specifies that they are doing so "for damage" then you roll your largest hit die and take that much holy damage instead of the normal healing effect. This does not consume any of your hit dice.
Deal enough mana drain to kill the target. If this successfully kills the target, you revitalize.
You are immune to being frightened or charmed. The effects of Undead Mind are maintained even if transformed.

You are immune to unconsciousness, suffocating, and being poisoned. You do not drop due to being at negative HP. You still die when you reach half your maximum HP below zero. You also do not have to breathe.
You gain Supernatural Strength. In addition, you deal boosted with all melee weapon attacks and they are AV0 for you.
You gain Giant Strength and Shattering Grip. In addition, you may deboost any melee weapon attack to make it AV0.
You gain Improved Strength and Melee Damage Boost. In addition, you are no longer suffer the consequences of cumbersome items.
You gain Beastly Strength and Improved Armor Piercing.

Can wield two-handed weapons in one hand.
Note: AP weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be AV0.
Melee weapons you use are armor piercing.
You may spend an unused action to boost the triggering damage.
overview.proficient: You may spend an additional unused action to boost the triggering damage again.

system.trigger: You have hit a creature with a damaging melee weapon attack.

overview.base: You have another body part (tail, tentacle, etc.) that can be used as an additional hand. When used to make a hand attack, this body part has the wraparound fighting style.
